snippet: The controversy surrounding the transfer of Brazilian Neymar to Barcelona is "unfair" because the Spanish champions have done nothing wrong, club president Josep Maria Bartomeu said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Barcelona Have Done Nothing Wrong in Neymar Transfer-Club President
headline.main: Barcelona Have Done Nothing Wrong in Neymar Transfer-Club President

lead_paragraph: The controversy surrounding the transfer of Brazilian Neymar to Barcelona is "unfair" because the Spanish champions have done nothing wrong, club president Josep Maria Bartomeu said on Monday.
